Key Match Events: David Fry launched a season-altering two-run homer off Beau Brieske into left field
Fry contributed to the rally in the top of the ninth with a squeeze play
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians forced a fifth game in the Division Series, deciding who takes on the Yankees in the ALCS
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers have already stood out as the Cinderella of the 2024 MLB postseason
The game was a back-and-forth affair at Comerica Park in Detroit
Others: The Yankees' ALCS opponent will be decided on Saturday in Cleveland
The Guardians have not yet revealed their Game 5 starter
